appearance: You look like you fell out of the ugly tree and hit every branch on the way down.
Your face looks like it was on fire and someone tried to put it out with a chainsaw.
intelligence: You're so dense, light bends around you.
If brains were dynamite, you wouldn't have enough to blow your nose.
personality: You have the personality of a wet paper bag filled with disappointment.
You're the reason aliens haven't visited Earth.
